column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo so soɛɛr ɔman no mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo atorfo bɛba hom so hom mu a wɔdze ɔsɛɛ fɛkuwsɛm bɛba abɛhyɛ mu nsumaa mu
column4: dɛ wɔbɔpow Ewuradze a ɔtɔɔ hɔn no mpo
column5: na wɔdze ɔsɛɛ a ɔba ntsɛntsɛm aba hɔn do."

column2: "Na dodowara bedzi hɔn ehuhubra no ekyir; na osian hɔn ntsi wɔbɛka nokwar no ho nsɛmbɔn."
"Na wɔnam enyiber mu dze ndaadaasɛm bɛpɛ hom hɔ adze: hɔn na ofi tsetse hɔn atsɛmbu nnkyinkyim dabiarada
"Na sɛ Nyankopɔn enngyaa abɔfo a wɔyɛɛ bɔn no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn guu amandzehu kurow no mu
column4: na ɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ mona sunkamm mu dɛ wɔmfa hɔn nsie atsɛmbu;"

column2: "na sɛ oenngyaa tsetse wiadze no
column3: na ɔkoraa Noa a ɔyɛ tsenenee sɛnkafo nye beesuon bi so
column4: ber a ɔdze nsuyirii bɛkataa emumuyɛfo wiadze do no;"

column2: "na sɛ ɔdaan Sodom nye Gomora nkurow nso
column4: dze hɔn yɛɛ asɛndahɔ maa hɔn a ekyir no wɔbɛyɛ emumuyɛ no;"

column2: "na oyii ɔtseneneenyi Lot a emumuyɛfo dze hɔn ehuhubra haaw no no:"
"(na dɛm mbrato ndwuma a nyimpa tsenenee no a ɔtse hɔn mu no hunii na ɔtsee no
column3: yii ne kra ahomtsew daa nyina)."

column2: "Ewuradze nyim mbrɛ oyiyi nyamesurofo fi nsɔhwɛ mu
column3: na osie hɔn a wɔnntsen wɔ ntsea ase dze kɔ atsɛmbu da no;"

column2: "na nkanka hɔn a wodzi honam ekyir efifidze ho akɔndɔ mu
column3: na wobu tumdzi adze kakrabaa bi no. Wɔyɛ enyiɔdzemfo
column5: hɔn ho mmpopo dɛ wɔbɛka etumfo ho nsɛmbɔn:"

column2: "wɔ ber a abɔfo a wɔso wɔ tum nye ahoɔdzen mu mpo mmfa nsɛmbɔn mmbu hɔn atsɛn wɔ Ewuradze enyim."
"Na yinom dze
column3: wɔtse dɛ abɔdze a wonnyi adwen
column4: wɔawo hɔn dɛ mbowa a wɔkyer hɔn sɛɛ hɔn
column5: wɔka nsɛmbɔn wɔ dza wonnyim ho
column6: wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn sɛɛ mu;"

column2: "wobenya dza ɔnntsen ho akatua; dza wobu no enyigye nye dɛ wɔgor asakasakagor ewia
column4: wɔbɔ akɔhwibra ber a wɔnye hom ridzi ɔdɔ edzidzi;"

column2: "wɔwɔ enyiwa a awarto ahyɛ no ma a ɔronndwe wɔ bɔn ho da; wɔdaadaa akra a hɔn ase nntsimii; wɔwɔ akoma a wɔaben enyiber mu; ndom mba;"
"woegya akwantsen hɔ akɔfom kwan
column3: woekedzi Beor ba Balaam kwan ekyir; ɔno na ɔdɔɔ ndzeyɛɛ bɔn akatua;"

column2: "na eso onyaa ne mbrato ho nkaenyim: asoasopɔnkɔ a onntum nnkasa dze nyimpa ndze kasae siankaa nkɔnhyɛnyi no n'egyimsɛm."
"Iyinom yɛ mbura a nsu nnyi mu
column3: ehubɔhubɔw a ehum rutu no kɔ; hɔn na wɔdze sum kebikebi esie hɔn daa."

column2: "Wɔkeka akɛsesɛm egyangyan
column3: nam honam akɔndɔ mu dze ahoɔdɛw daadaa hɔn a wofii abrabɔ bɔn mu nnkyɛree no;"

column2: "wɔbɔ hɔn adehyedzi ho anohoba
column3: naaso hɔnara wɔyɛ prɔwee nkowaa; na nyia obi edzi n'enyim nkogu no
column4: ɔnoara na ɔdze no kɔ nkowaasom."

column2: "Na ber a wɔnam Ewuradze nye Agyenkwa Jesus Kraest do efi wiadze efifidze nsa ekyir no
column3: wɔkɔtoto mu bio hwe ase a
column4: hɔn ekyir asetsena dan hɔn bɔn kyɛn kan no."

column2: "Na nkyɛ oye ma hɔn dɛ woennhu tsenenee kwan no
column4: wɔbɛdan efi ahyɛdze krɔnkrɔn no a wɔdze ahyɛ hɔn nsa no ho."

column2: "Na ayɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ nokwar bɛ no se
column3: Ɔkraman asan akɔ nankasa ne fe ho bio
column4: na Prekober a woeguar no no
column5: asan akɔ ne dɛtseprɔtɔɔ a ɔyankam wɔ mu no mu."
